title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file with unsaved editors, the JAR packager reports the error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved changes, the JAR packager should prompt a dialog to allow saving before the JAR creation process starts.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Enter all the necessary fields for the JAR creation.
3. Before pressing finish, make sure there are unsaved changes in the open editors.
4. Press the finish button to attempt JAR creation.
